Welcome to UNorganised. You may use our services through our mobile application (\“UNorganised App\”).Our App has been created to provide household and commercial services be it handyman services like plumbing, carpentry , laundry or niche services like Wedding planners, Bakers and all these services are accessible to you through our mobile App. For the purpose of these Terms of Use, the term UNorganised or \'us or \'We/we\' or \‘The App\’ refers to SlapDash Pvt Ltd. The term \'You\' refers to the user or viewer of our App. When you use any of the Services provided by us you will be subject to the rules, guidelines, policies, terms, and conditions applicable to such service, and they shall be deemed to be incorporated into this Terms of Use and shall be considered as part and parcel of these Terms of Use. As long as you comply with these Terms of Use, we grant you a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited privilege to enter and use our platforms. In the event of a conflict or inconsistency between any provision of the terms and conditions mentioned herein with those of the particular service, the provisions of the terms and conditions applicable to such specific services shall prevail.

\ Please read the complete terms of use in the Terms and Conditions from our menu on our App. By using, visit, accessing our platforms, you agree to be bound by this Terms of Use, whether you are a \“Visitor\” (which means that you simply browse our Platforms) or you are a \“Service Professional/Service User\” (which means that you have registered with Unorganised as a user). If you do not accept the Terms of Use, you should leave the App and discontinue use of the Service immediately. Once you are a registered user, you comply the rules and laws as mentioned in the section of our App.

\ We may modify these Terms from time to time, and such modification shall be effective upon its posting on our platforms. You agree to be bound by any modification to this Agreement when you use our Unorganised App after any such modification is posted; it is therefore important that you review the Terms of Use regularly.

PLEASE READ THE TERMS OF USE THOROUGHLY AND CAREFULLY. The terms and conditions set forth below(\“Terms of Use\”) and the Privacy Policy constitute a legally-binding agreement between SlapDash Inc. Pvt Ltd(\“Unorganised\”) and you. These Terms of Use contain provisions that define your limits, legal rights and obligations with respect to your use of and participation in (i) the Unorganised mobile application(referred to as the \“App\”), including the forums, various email functions and Internet links, and all content and Unorganised services available through the mobile application and (ii) the online transactions between those users of the app who are offering services(referred as “Service Professional”) and the ends users availing the services(referred as “Service User”) through the App.The Terms of Use described below incorporates the Privacy Policy and apply to all users of the App,including users who contributed to video content, information, private and public messages, advertisements, and other materials on the App.You also acknowledge that the App serves as a venue for the online distribution and publication of user submitted information between Service Professionals and Service Users and, by visiting, registering for the services presented, promoted and displayed on the App, by clicking on “Accept”, you hereby certify that (1) you are either a Service professional or a prospective Service User or both (2) you have the authority to enter into these Terms of Use, (3) you authorize the transfer of payment for the services requested through the App by modes like Cash & Online Payment , and (4) you agree to bound by all terms and conditions of these Terms of Use and any other document incorporated by reference herein.If you do not agree to these terms and conditions of Terms of Use, you should not click on “Accept”, in which case you are prohibited from using the App, also withdraw from viewing, clicking, participating in the App with immediate effect.BY USING THE APP, YOU CERTIFY YOU ARE AT LEAST 18 YEARS OF AGE AND LEGEALLY ELIGIBLE TO ENTER INTO AN ENFORCEABLE CONTRACT Unorganised reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to change, update or otherwise modify the Terms of Use, and other any other references incorporated hereby for complying with legal and regulatory conditions, or for other legitimate business purposes ,at any time and the same will be updated in the Terms of Use page with the last update date. It is solely your responsibility to review the Terms of Use for any changes on a regular basis. At any point of time, you don’t agree with the terms and conditions, please do not use the App.
